00007 TFancyHistogramCanvas::TFancyHistogramCanvas(THistogramArrayBase* histoArray, 
00008                                              std::string name, int numberChannelsInGroups,
00009                                              bool disableAutoUpdate):
00010   TCanvasHandleBase(name),
00011   fHistoArray(histoArray),
00012   fDisableAutoUpdate(disableAutoUpdate){
00013 
00014   if(numberChannelsInGroups > 1)
00015     fNumberChannelsInGroups = numberChannelsInGroups;
00016   else
00017     fNumberChannelsInGroups = -1;
00018 
00019   fLabelframe = 0;
00020   fChannelCounterButton = 0;
00021   fLabelChannels = 0;
00022   fChannelName = "Histogram";
00023 
00024   fGroupCounterButton = 0;
00025   fLabelGroup = 0;
00026   fGroupName = "Group";
00027 
00028   fMultiCanvasButton = 0;
00029   fNCanvasButtonGroup =0;
00030   fNCanvasButtons[0]=0;
00031   fNCanvasButtons[1]=0;
00032   fNCanvasButtons[2]=0;
00033   fNCanvasButtons[3]=0;
00034   fOverlayHistoButton = 0;
00035   fNHistoButton = 0;
00036   labelNHisto = 0;
00037 
00038   // Construct the legend here, so that user can modify position immediately.
00039   fNHistoLegend = new TLegend(0.6,0.6,0.89,0.8);
00040   fNHistoLegend->SetFillColor(10);
00041 
00042 }

00048 /// This is the complicated part, where we create a bunch of buttons and widgets.
00049 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::SetUpCompositeFrame(TGCompositeFrame *compFrame, TRootanaDisplay *display){
00050 
00051   /// Cached pointer to rootana display; needed so that we can 
00052   /// create new buttons with correct callbacks.
00053   fDisplay = display;
00054   
00055   // Now create my embedded canvas, along with the various buttons for this canvas.  
00056   fLabelframe = new TGHorizontalFrame(compFrame,200,40);
00057   compFrame->AddFrame(fLabelframe, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsCenterX,2,2,2,2));
00058   
00059   // ________________________________________________________________________________
00060   // Add a button for the groups, if we are using groups
00061   
00062   if(fNumberChannelsInGroups > 1){
00063     
00064     int numberGroups = (int)(((double)fHistoArray->size())/((double)fNumberChannelsInGroups));
00065 
00066     fGroupCounterButton = new TGNumberEntry(fLabelframe, 0, 9,999, TGNumberFormat::kNESInteger,
00067                                               TGNumberFormat::kNEANonNegative, 
00068                                               TGNumberFormat::kNELLimitMinMax,
00069                                               0, numberGroups-1);
00070     
00071     fLabelframe->AddFrame(fGroupCounterButton, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00072     // Add call-backs to update plots if widget is used
00073     fGroupCounterButton->Connect("ValueSet(Long_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00074     fGroupCounterButton->GetNumberEntry()->Connect("ReturnPressed()", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00075     
00076     // Add a label for channel selector    
00077     fLabelGroup = new TGLabel(fLabelframe, "");
00078     fLabelframe->AddFrame(fLabelGroup, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00079     SetGroupName(fGroupName);
00080   }
00081 
00082   // ________________________________________________________________________________
00083   // Create the default set of widgets used for all display options: namely a counter
00084   // that keeps track of which channel to start from.
00085 
00086   int numberChannels = fHistoArray->size();
00087   if(fNumberChannelsInGroups > 1){
00088     numberChannels = fNumberChannelsInGroups;    
00089   }
00090   fChannelCounterButton = new TGNumberEntry(fLabelframe, 0, 9,999, TGNumberFormat::kNESInteger,
00091                                          TGNumberFormat::kNEANonNegative, 
00092                                          TGNumberFormat::kNELLimitMinMax,
00093                                          0, numberChannels-1);
00094   
00095   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fChannelCounterButton, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00096   // Add call-backs to update plots if widget is used
00097   fChannelCounterButton->Connect("ValueSet(Long_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00098   fChannelCounterButton->GetNumberEntry()->Connect("ReturnPressed()", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00099 
00100   // Add a label for channel selector
00101   fLabelChannels = new TGLabel(fLabelframe, "");
00102   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fLabelChannels, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00103   SetChannelName(fChannelName);
00104 
00105   // ________________________________________________________________________________
00106   // Create a button to control whether to use multiple canvases
00107   fMultiCanvasButton = new TGCheckButton(fLabelframe, new TGHotString("Multi-Canvas"));
00108   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fMultiCanvasButton, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00109 
00110   // Add call-backs to update plots if button is used; ensure both not all modes are simultaneously active
00111   fMultiCanvasButton->Connect("Toggled(Bool_t)", "TFancyHistogramCanvas", this, "ActivateMultiCanvasButton()");
00112   fMultiCanvasButton->Connect("Toggled(Bool_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00113 
00114   /// Add the button group to control how many sub-canvases to plot.
00115   fNCanvasButtonGroup = new TGHButtonGroup(fLabelframe, "Number of Canvases:");
00116   fNCanvasButtons[0] = new TGRadioButton(fNCanvasButtonGroup, new TGHotString("2 | "),1);
00117   fNCanvasButtons[1] = new TGRadioButton(fNCanvasButtonGroup, new TGHotString("4 | "),2);
00118   fNCanvasButtons[2] = new TGRadioButton(fNCanvasButtonGroup, new TGHotString("8 | "),3);
00119   fNCanvasButtons[3] = new TGRadioButton(fNCanvasButtonGroup, new TGHotString("16 | "),4);
00120   fNCanvasButtons[0]->SetOn();
00121   for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00122     fNCanvasButtons[i]->Connect("Toggled(Bool_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", fDisplay, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00123   
00124   fNCanvasButtonGroup->SetRadioButtonExclusive(kTRUE);
00125   
00126   fNCanvasButtonGroup->Show();
00127   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fNCanvasButtonGroup, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00128   fNCanvasButtonGroup->SetState(false);
00129   
00130   // ________________________________________________________________________________
00131   // Create a button to control whether to overlay histograms in a single canvas
00132   fOverlayHistoButton  = new TGCheckButton(fLabelframe, new TGHotString("Overlay-Histo"));
00133   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fOverlayHistoButton, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00134 
00135   // Add call-backs to update plots if button is used; ensure both not all modes are simultaneously active
00136   fOverlayHistoButton->Connect("Toggled(Bool_t)", "TFancyHistogramCanvas", this, "ActivateOverlayButton()");
00137   fOverlayHistoButton->Connect("Toggled(Bool_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00138 
00139   /// Add the button to control how many histograns to plot to plot.
00140   fNHistoButton = new TGNumberEntry(fLabelframe, 2, 9,999, TGNumberFormat::kNESInteger,
00141                                     TGNumberFormat::kNEANonNegative, 
00142                                     TGNumberFormat::kNELLimitMinMax,
00143                                     2, 20);
00144   fLabelframe->AddFrame(fNHistoButton, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00145   // Add call-backs to update plots if widget is used
00146   fNHistoButton->Connect("ValueSet(Long_t)", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00147   fNHistoButton->GetNumberEntry()->Connect("ReturnPressed()", "TRootanaDisplay", display, "UpdatePlotsAction()");
00148   fNHistoButton->SetState(false);
00149   // Add a label
00150   labelNHisto = new TGLabel(fLabelframe, "# Histo in Canvas");
00151   fLabelframe->AddFrame(labelNHisto, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsTop | kLHintsLeft, 5, 5, 5, 5));
00152    
00153 }

00157 /// Reset the histograms in fHistoArray.
00158 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::ResetCanvasHistograms(){
00159   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < fHistoArray->size(); i++)
00160     (*fHistoArray)[i]->Reset();
00161 }
00162   
00163 /// Update the histograms for this canvas.
00164 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::UpdateCanvasHistograms(TDataContainer& dataContainer){
00165 
00166   // If this variable is set, then skip calling the histogram updating;
00167   // histogram updating will happen elsewhere.
00168   if(fDisableAutoUpdate) return;
00169 
00170   fHistoArray->UpdateHistograms(dataContainer);
00171 }
00172   
00173 /// Plot the histograms for this canvas
00174 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::PlotCanvas(TDataContainer& dataContainer, TRootEmbeddedCanvas *embedCanvas){
00175 
00176 
00177   TCanvas* c1 = embedCanvas->GetCanvas();
00178   c1->Clear();
00179 
00180   int channel = fChannelCounterButton->GetNumberEntry()->GetIntNumber();
00181   if(fNumberChannelsInGroups > 1)
00182     channel = fGroupCounterButton->GetNumberEntry()->GetIntNumber() * fNumberChannelsInGroups
00183       + fChannelCounterButton->GetNumberEntry()->GetIntNumber();
00184   
00185   // Choose the display pattern based on which buttons have been pushed.
00186 
00187   // Multiple canvas option
00188   if(fMultiCanvasButton->IsOn()){
00189 
00190     int ncanvas = 1;
00191     if(fNCanvasButtons[0]->IsOn()){
00192       c1->Divide(1,2);
00193       ncanvas = 2;
00194     }
00195     if(fNCanvasButtons[1]->IsOn()){
00196       c1->Divide(2,2);
00197       ncanvas = 4;
00198     }
00199     if(fNCanvasButtons[2]->IsOn()){
00200       c1->Divide(2,4);
00201       ncanvas = 8;
00202     }
00203     if(fNCanvasButtons[3]->IsOn()){
00204       c1->Divide(4,4);
00205       ncanvas = 16;
00206     }
00207 
00208     for(int i = 0; i < ncanvas; i++){
00209       c1->cd(i+1);
00210       int index = i + channel;
00211       if(index >=0 && index < (int)fHistoArray->size() && (*fHistoArray)[index]){
00212         (*fHistoArray)[index]->Draw();
00213         (*fHistoArray)[index]->SetLineColor(1);
00214       }
00215     }
00216 
00217   }else if(fOverlayHistoButton->IsOn()){ // Show multiple histograms on same canvas.
00218 
00219     int nhisto = fNHistoButton->GetNumberEntry()->GetIntNumber();
00220 
00221     // Kind of annoying; need to do two loops through the data in order to check which is 
00222     // the maximum histogram.
00223     int first_channel = channel;
00224     int last_channel = channel + nhisto;
00225     if(last_channel > (int)fHistoArray->size())
00226       last_channel = fHistoArray->size();
00227 
00228     // find the maximum histogram;
00229     TH1 *max_histo = 0;
00230     for(int ichan = first_channel; ichan < last_channel; ichan++){
00231       if(max_histo == 0)
00232         max_histo = (*fHistoArray)[ichan];
00233       else if((*fHistoArray)[ichan]->GetMaximum() > max_histo->GetMaximum())
00234         max_histo = (*fHistoArray)[ichan];
00235       
00236     }
00237 
00238     // New loop again and draw as we go.
00239     max_histo->Draw();
00240     fNHistoLegend->Clear(); 
00241     char name[100];
00242     for(int ichan = first_channel; ichan < last_channel; ichan++){
00243 
00244       (*fHistoArray)[ichan]->SetLineColor(ichan-channel+1);
00245       sprintf(name,"Histogram # %i",ichan);
00246       fNHistoLegend->AddEntry((*fHistoArray)[ichan],(*fHistoArray)[ichan]->GetTitle());
00247 
00248       if((*fHistoArray)[ichan] == max_histo) continue;      
00249       (*fHistoArray)[ichan]->Draw("SAME");      
00250     }
00251 
00252     fNHistoLegend->Draw("SAME");
00253   
00254   }else{ // Default: single canvas, single histogram.
00255 
00256 
00257     if(channel >=0 && channel < (int) fHistoArray->size() && (*fHistoArray)[channel]){
00258       (*fHistoArray)[channel]->Draw();
00259       (*fHistoArray)[channel]->SetLineColor(1);
00260     }
00261 
00262   }
00263   c1->Modified();
00264   c1->Update();
00265 
00266 }

00281 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::ActivateMultiCanvasButton(){
00282   if(fMultiCanvasButton->IsOn()){
00283     fOverlayHistoButton->SetDown(false); // Deactivate overlay button
00284     fNCanvasButtonGroup->SetState(true); // Enable the set of Ncanvas buttons
00285     fNHistoButton->SetState(false);
00286   }else{
00287     fNCanvasButtonGroup->SetState(false);// Disable the set of Ncanvas buttons
00288 
00289   }
00290 }
00291 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::ActivateOverlayButton(){
00292   if(fOverlayHistoButton->IsOn()){
00293     fMultiCanvasButton->SetDown(false); // Deactivate multi-canvas button
00294     fNCanvasButtonGroup->SetState(false); // Disable the set of Ncanvas buttons
00295     fNHistoButton->SetState(true);
00296   }else{
00297     fNHistoButton->SetState(false);
00298   }
00299 
00300   
00301 
00302 }

00305 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::SetGroupName(std::string groupName){
00306 
00307   fGroupName = groupName;
00308   
00309   if(!fLabelGroup) return;
00310   int numberGroups = (int)(((double)fHistoArray->size())/((double)fNumberChannelsInGroups));
00311   char tlabel[100];
00312   sprintf(tlabel,"%s# (0-%i)",groupName.c_str(),(int)numberGroups-1);    
00313 
00314   fLabelGroup->SetText(tlabel);//TGLabel
00315 }
00316 
00317 void TFancyHistogramCanvas::SetChannelName(std::string channelName){
00318 
00319   fChannelName = channelName;
00320 
00321   if(!fLabelChannels) return;
00322   int numberChannels = fHistoArray->size();
00323   if(fNumberChannelsInGroups > 1){
00324     numberChannels = fNumberChannelsInGroups;    
00325   }
00326 
00327   char tlabel[100];
00328   sprintf(tlabel,"%s# (0-%i)",channelName.c_str(),(int)numberChannels-1);    
00329 
00330   fLabelChannels->SetText(tlabel);//TGLabel
00331 
00332 
00333 }
